Issue.creator: elli-androulaki
Issue.summary: As an infrastructure developer i want to enhance peer partitions with participant peer anonymity
Issue.description: If the partition a certain transaction refers to is assumed to be anonymous, i.e., only only peers who are member of partitions know the rest of the members of a partition, then this item refers to the design of techniques that would allow for this capability. We may also need to explore the relationship between endorsers included in endorsement policies and partitions.
